title: Bot Crash & Systemic Failure Protocol
description: Metagit-aware guidelines for forensic investigation, interactive triage, and swarm-based recovery.

values.name: Audit Swarm Comms
values.rule: Scan .swarm_comms for agent announcements and status alerts.
values.rationale: Identify agents attesting to specific streams.

values.name: Up-Stream Tail Analysis
values.rule: Examine the tail of the last 5 .txt logs in the .chat_history directory.

values.name: Interactive Identification
values.rule: Compare active script processes against a baseline before/after user termination.

values.name: Cross-Metagit Commit Audit
values.rule: Review git logs across all repositories in the metarepo map.

values.name: Forensic Backfill
values.rule: Create backfilled announcements in .swarm_comms for agents who failed to self-announce.

values.name: Post-Mortem Analysis
values.rule: Check for recursive errors; escalate tail to 500+ lines; chunk read large logs.

values.name: WeDo Publication
values.rule: Formalize findings into a WEDO report in the .wedo directory (json/wedo/).
